actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide for the use of the Coast Guard cutter Chautaqua as an exhibition and education center.

summary.text: Directs the Commandant of the Coast Guard to establish a permanent exhibition aboard the Coast Guard cutter Chautaqua for the purpose of educating the public regarding the present and future mission of the Coast Guard.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the use of the Coast Guard cutter Chautaqua as an exhibition and education center.
